website_summaries.verdict: A gorgeous sous vide from a reputable name in kitchenware that focuses on accuracy so you can enjoy your meal.
cons: It's expensive, and there have been a few durability complaints

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Buy an Anova.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, initially really liked them. I own about 10 sous vide circulators of all brands/models. I probably used these one less than 10 times and one of them has already died. Flashes random temperatures over 200 and beeps incessantly with the time. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Turk

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Priority 1!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sous vide with physical buttons, no connectivity like Wi-Fi or Bluetooth, and that was built to last by a reputable company. I have tried other cookers with touch screen buttons that failed rather quickly or that could not hold a temperature but this device does what it is supposed to consistently. I have used atleast twice each week for months with no issues. I do wish the clamp to mount it to a container was adjustable but that is a minor thing. Seems silly that I have to pay so much more to get a device with less bells and whistles but like many others I value quality much more.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Green

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at less than 12 times using
customer_reviews.text: I've made Yogurt, Limoncello, Ginger liquor and Orangecello - now I try to set the temp and it just flashes. I am trying to descale it (1/2 water, 1/2 vinegar, set to 140 deg. for 30 min) because there really isn't any other troubleshooting information available. It also cannot heat the milk to 180 and hold it for 20 minutes, so I have to do that in another pot which isn't great either since All Clad says it should be able to heat to that temp and hold it. So now I spent A LOT of money on something that is now useless
customer_reviews.author: icdeals

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good solid device that had all of the controls conveniently located. I did NOT want one controlled by a phone app. This unit fits my needs. I used a Thermopen and checked the temperature of the meat when cooking was complete. Right on. Easy to use and easy to clean. Things that are difficult to cook conventionally such as lobster tails came out perfect. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cheap,consumer grade and worthless
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. This device will not hold temp for more than a few minutes . If not constantly monitored it will stop circulating and over heat. I have thousands of dollars worth of all clad cookware, but this is trash....going to go purchase a real commercial unit.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built... and very accurate. Love this product will buy more for my business
customer_reviews.author: hitori ryu

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design, but a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sous vide machine. Works great, easy to use, fast. But my living room and kitchen are connected and it is a bit loud. If i would have separate kitchen, i wouldnt mind the noise, but it's not my case.
customer_reviews.author: Shakti

customer_reviews.title: Simple sous vide
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with two buttons and one knob. Excellent results but a little experimentation is probably in order. Most importantly the unit holds an accurate temperature for long and short periods of time. Good looking and you dont need to be connected to the interwebs to use it. Overall very satisfied, got mine on sale at Williams Sonoma.
customer_reviews.author: Leo S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by lack of thought
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my sister's Anova to see if I even like sous vide cooking. Loved it. My husband bought me this Al Clade for Christmas and I think he could have saved his money. Pros: Solid construction, easy to use, fast heat-up speeds and great outcome Cons: SUPER loud (even if you put a towel under the container its in), square shape makes it extremely hard to find a container/lid combo for it, does not have an adjustable arm. For the money you pay they could have designed this much better and made a container/lid accessory. I would have been perfectly fine with a less expensive product. More $$, is not always better in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Dettlaff

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud.
customer_reviews.text: While this thing works well, it's simply too loud. It comes up to temperature correctly and holds it there, and makes delicious food. The problem is the ridiculous amount of noise it makes (in my video). It is as loud as my microwave. It's also not possible to purchase accessories for it.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: Quit after second use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great twice still heats but circulator motor froze up ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple, high quality product which is what I expect from All Clad. This unit does exactly what it is supposed to and we love it! Sous Vide cooking is in now and there are a ton of tools available. This unit does not connect to my phone which is really quite nice. I give this one a huge thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K

customer_reviews.title: Large, heavy duty professional level sous vide cooker
customer_reviews.text: The size is the first thing you will notice, it's big. You will need relatively large containers to use it, I would actually be concerned about it tipping over in a small pot, it is that big and heavy, it is professional level. It also has a 3 pronged plug. The controls are easy to figure out, I like that the head turns for easy access. The instructions include cooking times and even a few recipes. It can be fairly loud and that will vary with the container used and even be relatively quiet sometimes, otherwise it works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Easey to use, great results
customer_reviews.text: I am completely new to sous vide cooking and am so glad I have tried it! Things can be cooked to an exact desired temperature. this is a very well made cooker with a digital display that is easy to read. the instructions were straight forward and easy to follow. My first attempt was a medium steak, which turned out wonderful! I did put it briefly under the broiler for browning, but the steak was very tender and juicy--perfect! I am going to use this for other meats as well.
customer_reviews.author: informednow

product_meta.title: All-Clad EH800D51 Sous Vide Professional Immersion Circulator Slow Cooker with Digital Display for Precise Cooking Results, Silver
product_meta.description: Create restaurant-quality results with this All-Clad EH800D51 Sous Vide Immersion Circulator. The sous vide device uses low heat to evenly cook food, and there’s no need to worry about over cooking. Simply attach the EH800D51 to the side of any water-filled pot, drop in sealed ingredients, and return later to perfectly cooked food. Ideal for novice and experienced cooks alike, the easy-to-use All-Clad sous vide cooking device provides results and consistent temperature control with 1-degree accuracy, while its LCD screen clearly displays the countdown timer and temperature (adjustable from 77 - 210 degrees F). The 1000 W. All-Clad immersion circulator also offers quiet operation, a large 5 Gal. capacity, and an easy-to-secure clamp. With its stainless-steel finish and compact size, the All-Clad EH800D51 Sous Vide Immersion Circulator makes a sleek, useful addition to any kitchen.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT Countdown timer to track the progress
EASY TO USE Easy to read LED displays real time temperature and timer to monitor your progress
DURABILITY Easy to use adjustable clamp to secure your circulator to whatever cooking vessel you prefer
INTUITIVE / PRECISE Professional style precise temperate control
DESIGN Beautiful, high gloss All-Clad stainless steel finish.
